categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Sarissa Ven was a female Human Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. Wielding two lightsabers in combat, she was one of the commanders of the Republic forces during the Battle of Ilum.

Master Sarissa Ven was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Strongholds, which added Conquest Commanders to most of the dual-faction worlds. Ven is a rare NPC enemy, and her place at the Republic base camp on Ilum is frequently occupied by a generic Veteran Jedi Battlemaster.
